column4: Lubuntu does not use all of my RAM. I have 2GB RAM but only 991mb is used. Anyone can help me?
are you doing something that you would expect to use up all of your ram with? if you're not doing anything, the ram isn't going to be used
the currently unused ram will get used for caching data, etc, but on my machine <1GB of ram is used if I just start it up and do nothing.
Ah - it's not showing that you have as much ram as you should. that's a different problem
